title: PUBLIC BETA ENVIRONMENT(PBE)
body: I want to know how i can make PBE acc and donwoald PBE league

replies.body:
You can signup up for a PBE invite by using the [**PBE Signup page**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe), as *Khezu* mentioned. I recommend reaching through our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more information on how the system works.

Let me know if you have any questions.

You can access the PBE page by clicking on your name in the top right corner of the page and selecting the "PBE" option. Alternatively, you can just use [this link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) to go directly to the PBE sign-up page.
